name: Dead Link
description:
Play with WASD and the mouse.
We strongly recommend you to play it on fullscreen (it makes the game easier).

Good luck !

In life, one must first befriend stronger allies; only to betray them later on.

Your final enemy

Connect with other beings to copy their skills! 

Be the last one alive to have the opportunity to defeat the final angry cow.

Big thanks to Capou who helped us doing the graphics ! (go follow her on Twitter at @CapouArt)
